metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7516 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2015-1197. Reason: This candidate is a duplicate of CVE-2015-1197. Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2015-1197 instead of this candidate. All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> this CVE is a dupe of CVE-2015-1197 and should not be used, marking as ignored

criterions.comment: cpio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
